title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a hearty mixture of seasoned ground beef, rice, and topped with melted cheese. A classic comfort dish that's both nutritious and delicious.

ingredients.item: Large bell peppers (red, yellow, green, or orange)

instructions: Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds and membranes. Place peppers in a baking dish.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add diced onion and minced garlic, and sauté for 2-3 minutes until fragrant.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.
Stir in diced tomatoes, tomato paste, Italian seasoning, paprika, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Add cooked rice and half of the shredded cheese. Mix well.
Spoon the filling mixture into each bell pepper, pressing down slightly to pack it tightly.
Top each pepper with the remaining shredded cheese.
Cover the baking dish with foil and bake for 25 minutes.
Remove foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with fresh parsley if desired. Serve hot.
